explanation.author: Author-1
explanation.expln: The (simultaneous) enjoyment of the five senses of sight, hearing, taste, smell and touch can only be found with bright braceleted (women).

explanation.author: திருக்குறளார் வீ. முனிசாமி

explanation.author: மணக்குடவர்

explanation.expln: Can the lotus-eyed Vishnu's heaven be indeed as sweet to those who delight to sleep in the delicate arms of their beloved ?.
